name: duterte-speeches
tagline: small set of textual files with bi-lingual (filipino, english) speaches by Philippines president - Rodrigo Duterte
body:
### Welcome to Duterte Speeches
archive of text transcriptions of President of the Philippines - Rodrigo Duterte 
transcriptions are reviewed and come from filipino news outlets or official 
PRESIDENTIAL COMMUNICTATIONS 

President Duterte is a "controversial" president of the Philippines, elected on the promise of fighting crime, corruption and inequality in Philippines 2016. 


### Authors and Contributors
authors are workers of @appopsph and @cebu-data @data-ph 

### Support or Contact
please emails fili.cebu //at\\ gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
